channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Polymarket likely to remain offshore for now despite ruling in favor of U.S. election betting
item.description: The predictions market Kalshi successfully sued the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, which might appeal the ruling.

item.title: Citi says buy this boat dealer because Fed rate cuts will increase affordability
item.description: The Wall Street bank upgraded shares of MarineMax to buy from neutral.

item.title: Boeing’s stock enjoys bounce as Starliner and strike headwinds recede
Trump’s dollar dominance plan would make countries ditch the greenback, analyst says
item.description: “If the US were to impose prohibitive tariffs across the board, they would cause massive disruption to the global economic system.”

item.title: Air Canada prepares to shut down as talks with pilots union near deadlock
item.description: Air Canada is finalizing plans to suspend most of its operations, likely beginning Sunday, as talks with the pilot union are nearing an impasse.

item.title: Cboe volatility gauge in sharp decline as stock market rebounds
Elon Musk could become the world’s first trillionaire by 2027, report says
item.description: That club could grow quickly over the next 10 years.

item.title: Nelson Peltz steps down as chair of Wendy's board, starting a new era for burger chain
item.description: Peltz's Trian Fund Management has a 10% stake in Wendy's, making it the company's second-largest shareholder.

item.title: Boeing shares rising after labor pact removes headwind
Gen Zers aspire to a career in finance—but on their own terms
item.description: A staggering number of new graduates say they prioritize making positive societal contributions through their work, according to the CFA Institute.

item.title: A Porsche-backed startup is building a massive EV battery recycling plant in Europe
item.description: Cylib, a startup backed by luxury sports car firm Porsche and appliances maker Bosch, is building a massive battery recycling facility in Germany.

item.title: Why Nvidia's outsized influence over the S&P 500 could soon wane
Tesla posts 2024 high in China car sales last month, but is still losing share to rivals like BYD
item.description: Elon Musk claims a report that says Tesla's market share is declining in China is "silly" as his factory runs at full steam.

item.title: Big Lots sells business to Nexus Capital as it begins bankruptcy proceedings
item.description: Big Lots said on Monday it has secured $707.5 million to support its operations and sell its business to private equity firm Nexus Capita.

item.title: Dow’s morning gain tops 300 points amid stock-market rebound bid — live coverage
